about.title: About Model Guru
about.subtitle: Empowering AI Innovation Through Comprehensive Model Discovery
about.pageDescription: Learn about our mission, vision, and the team behind Model Guru - your trusted platform for AI model discovery and comparison.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to AI models by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly platform for discovery, comparison, and implementation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the go-to platform for AI practitioners, researchers, and businesses seeking to leverage the power of AI models.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible in AI model discovery and comparison.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Providing clear, accurate, and unbiased information about AI models and platforms.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a vibrant community of AI enthusiasts and professionals who share knowledge and experiences.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making AI model discovery accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical background.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate individuals behind Model Guru

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: Organizations we work with to bring you the best AI model discovery experience

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: A passionate group of AI and ML experts dedicated to simplifying model discovery

members.name: Alex Chen
members.bio: Alex is a seasoned AI engineer with over 10 years of experience in machine learning and data science. He founded Model Guru to address the challenges he faced in model discovery.

members.name: Brenda Lee
members.bio: Brenda leads product development, focusing on user experience and translating complex data into actionable insights. She has a background in data visualization and product management.

members.name: Chris Patel
members.bio: Chris oversees the data aggregation and analysis pipelines, ensuring data quality and developing new metrics. He holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science with a focus on NLP.

members.name: Diana Garcia
members.bio: Diana engages with the Model Guru community, gathering feedback and fostering a collaborative environment. She is passionate about open source and AI ethics.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Help us shape the future of AI model discovery
careers.description: We are always looking for talented individuals who are passionate about AI and want to make an impact. Check out our open positions and see if there's a role that fits your skills and ambitions.
